comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1
Build ID: 20110928134238

Steps to reproduce:

I updated a webpage in wikipedia with some new information.  I then tried to re-load the page to show the updates.


Actual results:

The computer that had been used to make the page changes continued to show the outdated webpage presumably from cache.  No amount of reloading the page would bring up the current and valid page from wiki.  Opening the page from a different computer that had never visited that webpage readily showed the revised webpage.  I cleared the cache and then re-opened the webpage and got the correct document.


Expected results:

A screen refresh should have displayed the new webpage.
